Former Wilmington mayor and congressmen Hal Haskell dies at 98 Hal Haskell served one term as Delaware's congressmen during the 1950s; and one term as mayor of Wilmington from 1969 to 1972. delawareonline.com
2020-01-18T02:51:53.000Z: Hal was a really good man and a good friend. Until recently, I would see Hal at the Central YMCA, and he would often stop me to share an idea or comment on issues important to our city and state.
2020-01-18T02:51:52.000Z: I was sad today to learn of the passing of Hal Haskell, a former Congressman and Mayor of the City of Wilmington who dedicated his career to serving the people of Wilmington and our state.
